response.overview: The GLORY 104: Last Heavyweight Standing fight card taking place October 11 from the RTM Stage in the Netherlands is now complete with a GLORY world title bout, two heavyweight tournaments, and exciting fights from top to bottom.  The vacant GLORY light heavyweight championship will be decided as former champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 28 KO) collides with the wild & Bahram Rajabzadeh (72-5, 64 KO) in the main event of the evening.
response.title: GLORY 104
